definition[0]: set to operate at a particular time or in a particular way
example[0]: The computer records this information at preset intervals.
definition[1]: a control on a piece of equipment that has been set to operate in a particular way before it is used
example[1]: The monitor will automatically go back to thefactory presets.
definition[2]: to set a piece of equipment to operate in a particular way in advance
example[2]: You can preset the time when the machine comes on.
